attributes.name: background
attributes.desc: whether the buttons have a background color

attributes.name: page-size
attributes.desc: item count of each page, supports the .sync modifier

attributes.name: page-count
attributes.desc: total page count. Set either `total` or `page-count` and pages will be displayed; if you need `page-sizes`, `total` is required

attributes.name: pager-count
attributes.desc: number of pagers. Pagination collapses when the total page count exceeds this value

attributes.name: current-page
attributes.desc: current page number, supports the .sync modifier

attributes.name: layout
attributes.desc: layout of Pagination, elements separated with a comma

attributes.name: page-sizes
attributes.desc: options of item count per page

attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.desc: custom class name for the page size Select's dropdown

attributes.name: hide-on-single-page
attributes.desc: whether to hide when there's only one page

slots.desc: custom content. To use this, you need to declare `slot` in `layout`

events.name: @prev-click
events.desc: triggers when the prev button is clicked and current page changes

events.name: @next-click
events.desc: triggers when the next button is clicked and current page changes
